Ingredients.6: 1.0 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided, or as needed

Ingredients.8: 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, or as needed

Directions.1: Combine warm water, sugar, and yeast in a bowl. Add 1 cup flour; stir dough with a spatula.

Directions.2: Mix the remaining 1 cup flour, hot water, 2 tablespoons oil, and salt together in a separate bowl until dough-like in texture. Add the dough from step 1; knead together into a round ball, dusting with flour as needed. Place dough ball on a lightly floured work surface; cover with a warm, damp towel for 30 to 40 minutes.

Directions.3: Pinch dough ball into 2 pieces. Roll each out and sprinkle half the scallions on top. Roll up each piece into a tube; pinch each in half. Roll and flatten into large pancakes, dusting with flour, if needed.

Directions.4: Heat the remaining oil in a skillet over medium heat. Cook pancakes until browned, 3 to 4 minutes per side.
